item.title: Liveblog: Terraform Abstractions for Safety and Power
item.description: This is a liveblog for the HashiConf 2017 session titled “Terraform Abstractions for Safety and Power.” The speaker is Calvin French-Owen, Founder and co-CTO at Segment.
